overview: Four childhood friends go on a camping trip in the remote woods of the Pacific Northwest and get into a situation they never expected. Sound familiar? Can-Am presents an erotic fable featuring wet and muddy creek and lake-side wrestling action. When Beau decides he's had enough of the hijinks, he wrestles and subdues each of his friends. Then he stakes them out by the river banks to show them who's boss. Helpless and vulnerable, the trio is now subject to the whims of the devilish Beau. Set against lush scenery, Wrestle By Me also features the four well hung studs in solo j/o sequences. Camping anyone?
title: Wrestle By Me
